review: Cool hand little device for those of us that have cut the cable cord.  Wish there were more up to date options for viewing movies and latest TV episodes.  It would be great if you could actually access HBO Go or Showtime Go without having a contract with a cable provider. I like the size, very small and discreet, it's about the size of a CD case just a little thicker.
author: Erica

review: I love it! My cable company is terrible (cough, Comcast, cough) and On Demand will go months without working. I don't normally watch what is on TV at the time and prefer watching things when I feel like it. I've added Netflix, Tubi TV and Screambox so far and I haven't been disappointed. I did have to plug the ethernet cable in because my internet connection is also iffy sometimes...Comcast, I'm looking at you...and I haven't had any problems(knock on wood!).I would suggest everyone get one of these!
author: Dana A. Hedengren
